name: School of Fish (Surmoi)
description:
School of Fish is single player side-scroller 3D game developed during the Hitbox Makers 2023 Game Jam. Its theme seabed (Fonds marins in french) inspired me to create a chill game where the player controls a school of fish and face challenges found underwater.

Controls

Mouse

Your school of fish follows your mouse
Hold left click to increase their speed
Hold right click to force them to stay closer to each others

Controls

Music: Ambient Pad Background Music for Space or Underwater - Adventure by JuliusH
Icons: game-icons.net
Boids based on Coding Adventure: Boids by Sebastian Lague

Have Fun!

I hope you'll have as much fun as when I created this game and that you take some time to consider the tragic challenges sea creatures are facing today with human activities.
